title: Continuation of VIB3000 Platform Support
content: With Siemens Energy AG becoming independent from Siemens AG, the well-known vibration related portfolio around the VIB3000 hardware platform and the CM500 Vibroexpert software has become property of Siemens Energy AG.
The affected product portfolio comprises the following articles (MLFB numbers):
We will maintain the high standard in customer experience that our customers are used to from Siemens AG.

So, the shortest and hopefully most convenient way for our customers to place orders for new VIB3000 racks, spare parts and CM500 Vibroexpert software is to send an email to: vib3000-support@siemens-energy.com
Of course, you can email us with any other question or request as well!
